ItemName: Note: Searching for Mother in Dreamscape (III)
ItemBGDesc: Once more, you cross paths with the father and daughter at the Dream's Edge. They have yet to find Charlotte, however, they have discovered that Penacony's finest artists frequently assemble at The Reverie in the Dreamscape. Although the hotel in the Dreamscape is presently undergoing renovations, their determination remains unwavering as they plan to proceed there...
